title: 18: S1E18 – “Whispers in the Dark” (Part 2) – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this eighteenth episode of _[Scary Stories Told in the Dark](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/shows/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/)_, we pick up where part 3 of author [Eric Dodd](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/authors/eric-dodd/)‘s series “_The Stairs and the Doorway_” left off last week, and continue the saga with the fourth part – and the conclusion – of his thrilling tale, entitled "_The Side Tunnel,"_ again performed by host and narrator [Otis Jiry](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/performers/otis-jiry/). Join us once more as explore the secrets beneath our feet, in a search for answers, and perhaps closure. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: [http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s1e18/](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s1e18/)
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

content:encoded:
In this eighteenth episode of _[Scary Stories Told in the Dark](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/shows/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/)_, we pick up where part 3 of author [Eric Dodd](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/authors/eric-dodd/)‘s series “_The Stairs and the Doorway_” left off last week, and continue the saga with the fourth part – and the conclusion – of his thrilling tale, entitled "_The Side Tunnel,"_ again performed by host and narrator [Otis Jiry](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/performers/otis-jiry/). Join us once more as explore the secrets beneath our feet, in a search for answers, and perhaps closure. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: [http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s1e18/](http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s1e18/)
